snippet: The search for impartial jurors in the trial of two former allies of Gov. Chris Christie will be difficult, given the enormous media coverage of the lane-closing case....
lead_paragraph: The search for impartial jurors in the trial of two former allies of Gov. Chris Christie will be difficult, given the enormous media coverage of the lane-closing case.

headline.main: Lawyers to Begin Seeking Jurors in George Washington Bridge Case
